scripts.build:watch: tsc -p tsconfig.dist.json --outDir dist/esm --module esnext --watch & tsc -p tsconfig.dist.json --outDir dist/cjs --watch
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:min
scripts.docs: documentation readme src --resolve=node --pe ts --re ts --re d.ts --github --section=API --markdown-toc-max-depth=3 && dprint fmt README.md
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:web
scripts.test:web: if find test -type f -name '*.web.*' | grep -q .; then web-test-runner; else echo no web tests; fi
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && echo done.
scripts.build:bundle: esbuild dist/esm/index.js --bundle --format=esm --outfile="dist/$(cat package.json | jq -r '.name').js" && wc -c "dist/$(cat package.json | jq -r '.name').js"
scripts.build:min: terser --compress --module --mangle -o "dist/$(cat package.json | jq -r '.name').min.js" "dist/$(cat package.json | jq -r '.name').js" && wc -c "dist/$(cat package.json | jq -r '.name').min.js"
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build && (npm run build:dist || echo unable to bundle)
scripts.prepush: npm run lint && npm run test
